attributes.action: Save our British icon landrover Defender
attributes.additional_details:
The Landrover Defender has been an iconic British vehicle for over 60 years.
A utilitarian vehicle used by farmers through to the Queen herself, it has carried troops through wars, farmers through boggy fields, ladies to their horses and provided fun and laughter for those who use their defenders for recreational use!
And now Land Rover plan to axe a piece of our vehicular history, please help us stop this plan and save our Defenders in the shape and form we know and love!
